product_overview: VAYRA is a premium SaaS platform focused on debt planning, savings, and income growth with AI-powered financial coaching, subscription-based plan gating, and a polished, accessible user experience.
core_goals: Provide users with intuitive debt management and payment tracking features.
Offer tiered subscription plans with gated access to advanced financial tools and AI copilot assistance.
Ensure high accessibility and performance standards including WCAG 2.1 AA compliance and Lighthouse scores ≥90.
Deliver a multi-currency, multilingual, fully responsive PWA experience.
Implement secure Firebase authentication and Firestore-based user data isolation.
Enable real-time financial analytics, visualizations, and detailed reporting with export capabilities.
key_features: Complete Firebase Authentication with email/password and Google OAuth including plan gating enforcement.
Debt, payment, budget, income, and financial calendar management modules.
AI-powered features including chat and copilot for personalized financial guidance.
Multi-currency selector with localStorage persistence and multi-language support with dynamic UI adaptation.
Dashboard with sidebar navigation and error boundary handling.
Progressive Web App support with offline caching and service worker registration in production.
Robust UI component design system utilizing Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion animations.
Comprehensive analytics, reporting, education micro-courses, and behavioral coaching tools.
Plan gating with clear upgrade flows and blurred previews to encourage upsells.
Secure Firestore rules with user-specific data isolation and session persistence.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the public Landing page featuring branded hero with animated logo and call-to-action buttons.
User navigates to Sign Up or Sign In via email/password or Google OAuth, with appropriate error handling for auth failures.
Upon authentication, users are redirected to the Dashboard, with content gated according to their subscription plan (Free users redirected to Upgrade).
Users interact with financial modules such as debt tracking, payment scheduling, budgeting, income management, and educational micro-courses.
AI Copilot and chat features assist users with personalized insights and financial advice within the dashboard.
Users can switch app theme and language dynamically from any page and select their local currency preference with persistence.
The app supports offline use and can be installed as a PWA on mobile devices, maintaining access to cached content.
Users can view advanced analytics, export PDF reports, and access financial education content.
Throughout navigation, accessibility standards are maintained with keyboard navigation, focus outlines, and screen reader compatibility.
validation_criteria: Landing page displays exactly one branded SVG logo above the hero H1 and uses the shared SVG logo component linking home.
Authentication system supports email/password and Google sign-in with error feedback and session persistence.
Plan gating redirects free users attempting to access premium dashboard features to Upgrade page.
PWA manifests and icons load correctly returning HTTP 200 with proper masking and favicon support.
Animations on hero logo use subtle fade+scale and float effects respecting reduced-motion preferences.
No critical accessibility violations on key pages verified with axe-core scans.
Lighthouse audit scores ≥90 in Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO for Landing and Dashboard pages.
No console errors or failed network requests related to branding or core assets during navigation.
Responsive layouts verified at multiple breakpoints including mobile viewports with no layout shifts or overlaps.
Firestore security rules prevent unauthorized access and proper user documents create on sign-in.
